name: Haya Yellow Rose Candle
description: Elegant rose-shaped candle made with premium wax for a long, clean burn. Creates a warm and calming glow — perfect for home décor, meditation, or gifting.

name: Haya Foaming Facewash
description: Gentle foaming facewash with a built-in applicator brush for deep cleansing. Removes dirt, oil, and impurities while brightening the skin. Suitable for all skin types including oily, dry, and combination skin.

name: Haya Glow Moisturizing Cream
description: A nourishing face cream enriched with natural extracts to deeply hydrate, brighten, and restore your skin’s natural glow. Perfect for daily use and suitable for all skin types.

name: Haya Night Cream
description: A rich and nourishing night cream designed to repair, hydrate, and rejuvenate your skin while you sleep. Infused with natural extracts to reduce fine lines and restore a youthful glow.

name: Haya Night Cream
description: A rich and nourishing night cream designed to repair, hydrate, and rejuvenate your skin while you sleep. Enriched with natural extracts that help reduce fine lines and restore a youthful glow overnight

name: Haya Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50
description: A lightweight sunscreen lotion with SPF 50 and broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection. Enriched with aloe vera to soothe and hydrate skin while shielding it from sun damage.

name: Haya Vitamin C Serum
description: A lightweight and powerful Vitamin C serum designed to brighten skin, fade dark spots, and boost collagen production. Enriched with orange extracts for a natural glow and antioxidant protection.

name: Haya Herbal Hair Mask
description: A deeply nourishing herbal hair mask formulated to strengthen hair, reduce hair fall, and restore natural shine. Enriched with botanical extracts for smooth, healthy, and manageable hair.

name: Haya Body Whitening Lotion
description: A lightweight body whitening lotion that hydrates and helps brighten dull, uneven skin. Designed for daily use to promote a radiant and even-toned complexion.
